title: Tender for the Supply of Normal Immunoglobulin for Intravenous use - BP - 5G - 6G 9000 vials
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Serisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender, on the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, at a cost of US $990,000.00, was approved by the Cabinet.
